code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import VantaBackground from'./VantaBackground';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BackgroundReceiver=_ref=>{let{isLoggedIn}=_ref;const[activeBackground,setBackground]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const getUserCurrentBackground=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost/api/getUserCurrentBackground',{method:'GET',headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(isLoggedIn)}});const responseData=await response.json();if(!response.ok){console.error('Error:',responseData);}else{setBackground(responseData.background);}}catch(error){console.error('Error:',error);}};getUserCurrentBackground();},[isLoggedIn]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:activeBackground==='default'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen w-screen fixed top-0 left-0 bg-[rgb(18,18,18,0.9)]"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VantaBackground,{effect:activeBackground,classes:"min-h-screen w-screen fixed top-0 left-0"})});};export default BackgroundReceiver;
